about_the_game:
This Game Is About Riddles and Mind Trick Questions.


Challenging Question that will trick your brain to get the wrong answer.

Coming with 4(?) Choices of answers that will help you beat the game

Also provided you with all the reasons needed for each answer, so you don't get confused and ask me "Why?"

This Game Is Easy But It Might Be Hard.


The gameplay is Just play by answering a series of multiple-choice questions, the answer does not increase the difficulty by the level but the
the difficulty depends on how confused and how good your common sense and your memorizes are.

Use all your brain to clear this game, but don't worry I give you enough life (maybe) to clear the game easily.

Buy this game and enjoy the questions and many memes in the game

Unlock 500% of your brain power

Good Luck, Have Fun and Don't Give up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Window 7
  • Processor: 16-bit
  • Memory: 256 MB MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1/2 of NVIDIA® Radeon™ RTX120
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Even your potato can play smoothly
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: This game is about riddles and mind trick quiz with all the reason needed for each answer. You will need higher brain power than previous one to clear this game
